content: I love these ideas! My cousin is having a boy, so I think I'll focus on some cute boy-themed onesies and a personalized baby blanket with his name. Do you have any recommendations for a good baby carrier or sling? I've heard they're really helpful for new parents. And by the way, my sister gave birth to Ethan on February 12th, and I've been helping out with diaper duties and babysitting him every chance I get.
